statements: SELECT * FROM accommodations
SELECT id, name FROM accommodations WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT name, location FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage > 100
SELECT id, name, location FROM accommodations ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY name
SELECT id, name, location, water_usage FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT name, water_usage FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage < 50 ORDER BY name ASC, water_usage DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_accommodations FROM accommodations;
SELECT id, name FROM accommodations WHERE location = 'Paris' OR location = 'London';
SELECT * FROM accommodations;
SELECT name, location FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT id, name, location FROM accommodations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage < 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM conservation_strategies WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage > 100
SELECT name, location FROM accommodations ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE location LIKE 'City%'
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage < 50 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT id, name, location, water_usage FROM accommodations JOIN conservation_strategies ON accommodations.id = conservation_strategies.id
SELECT * FROM accommodations;
SELECT name,address FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT id,name,address FROM accommodations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM conservation_strategies WHERE id IN (1,2,3);
SELECT strategy_name,description FROM conservation_strategies;
SELECT id, name, address FROM accommodations;
SELECT name, address, water_usage FROM accommodations WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, address, water_usage FROM accommodations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT accommodation_id, SUM(water_used) AS total_water_used FROM water_usage_logs GROUP BY accommodation_id HAVING total_water_used > 500 ORDER BY total_water_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM accommodations;
SELECT name, location FROM accommodations WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT room_type, capacity FROM rooms ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE check_out_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT accommodation_id, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM water_logs GROUP BY accommodation_id;
SELECT * FROM accommodations ORDER BY location DESC, capacity ASC
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM accommodations WHERE capacity > 10
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE status = 'available' AND capacity >= 4 ORDER BY room_type ASC

SELECT accommodations.name, rooms.room_type, bookings.guest_name FROM accommodations JOIN rooms ON accommodations.id = rooms.accommodation_id JOIN bookings ON rooms.room_id = bookings.room_id WHERE bookings.check_in_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM water_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-02-28'
SELECT * FROM accommodations;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_name FROM accommodations ORDER BY accommodation_id DESC;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE guest_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM conservation_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT monitor_id, water_consumed FROM water_monitoring WHERE water_consumed > 100 ORDER BY water_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM accommodations ORDER BY accommodation_name DESC;
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, check_in_date FROM bookings WHERE check_out_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY check_in_date ASC;

SELECT accommodation_name, water_usage FROM accommodations JOIN water_monitoring ON accommodations.accommodation_id = water_monitoring.accommodation_id WHERE water_consumed > 100 ORDER BY water_usage DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT strategy_name FROM conservation_strategies WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;

SELECT accommodation_name, COUNT(booking_id) AS total_bookings FROM accommodations LEFT JOIN bookings ON accommodations.accommodation_id = bookings.accommodation_id GROUP BY accommodation_name ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
